headline.main: Trump Team’s Links to Russia Crisscross in Washington
headline.print_headline: Washington, With Moscow on Its Mind

lead_paragraph: In deciding against representing Team U.S.A. at the World Baseball Classic, the hard-throwing Syndergaard had a simple explanation: “I’m a Met.”
